column2: ms_ts = region_nm %>% filter(region == "Region Metropolitana") %>% select(msdf_all_2018_2019,msdf_all_2019_2020,msdf_all_2020_2021,msdf_all_2021_2022) %>% t() %>% .[,1] %>% unname()
tw_ts = region_nm %>% filter(region == "Region Metropolitana") %>% select(twitter_all_2019_2020,twitter_all_2020_2021,twitter_all_2021_2022          ) %>% t() %>% .[,1] %>% unname()
